QuestData.Title: The Fang of Shadra
QuestData.Description: We'll need the Fang of Shadra next.$B$BIt's kept in the Creeping Ruins to the east, guarded by Shadra's own spawn. Hideous spiders the size of a dwarf, and twice as strong. Their venom is strong, $n... don't get careless.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Fang of Shadra from the Creeping Ruins.
QuestData.RewardText: There it is... only one left, $glad:lass;.
